title: todo list
message: todo list

title: We scale them image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both…
message:
We scale them image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or larger than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).
Analogous: ImageView.ScaleType CENTER_CROP

title: some refactoring
message: some refactoring

title: Some contact pictures aren't square.
message:
Some contact pictures aren't square.
We scale them image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or larger than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).
Analogous: ImageView.ScaleType CENTER_CROP
